name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - G  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these is a holiday mouse?
questions.explanation:
Garlands.

	Garlands holds a basic wreath, a green circle of pine with a bow on it.  He is an all-white mouse. "While I was helping mom and dad Something for which they were quite glad I took a little break, you see And someone decorated me!"

questions.text: Which of these is a girl ghost?
questions.explanation:
Ghoulianne.

	Ghoulianne is a ghost that is specified as a girl ghost.  Ghoul and Ghostio are specified to be boys, and Ghoulish is simply a ghost. "Things that go bump in the nightCreaks and shrieks that cause a frightSpookiest things you've ever seenThat's why I love Halloween!"

questions.text: Which one of these is a dog?
questions.explanation:
GiGi.

	GiGi is a black poodle.  She also has two red bows on her ears. "Prancing and dancing all down the streetThinking her hairdo is oh so neatAlways so careful in the wind and rainShe's a dog that is anything but plain!"

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a Gift bear?
questions.explanation:
Faith.

	Joy, Love, and Peace are all bears named Gift, but each are different colors.  Joy is teal, Love is white, and Peace is red.  Their poems read the same, except for one word. Joy/Love/Peace: "A special gift that's just for youComes from a heart that's pure and trueAnd as the holiday bells ringThe gift of joy/love/peace is what I bring!"

questions.text: Which of these is an ancient elephant-like creature?
questions.explanation:
Giganto.

	Giganto is a woolly mammoth.  He is a brownish-red color, and his tusks are long and tan. "When you see me, be preparedI'm really big, so don't be scaredAll that matters in the endIs that I want to be your friend!"

questions.text: Which of these is a giraffe?
questions.explanation:
Giraffiti.

	Giraffiti the giraffe is yellow with orange spots.  He has a light green colored mouth, and his feet are light green, too. "If I stand on tippy toesThe leaves almost touch my noseI'm still to small to reach the treesWould you help me . . . pretty please ?!"

questions.text: Which of these is an animal that can only be found in Madagascar?
questions.explanation:
Gizmo.

	Gizmo is a lemur.  He has huge, red eyes.  His body is mostly brown. "What kind of creature can I beWith big, red eyes so I can seeI sleep all day and play all nightIf you guessed a lemur...you were right!"

questions.text: Which of these is a penguin?
questions.explanation:
Glacier.

	Glacier is no ordinary penguin, because she is pink.  Her head is dark pink, and the rest is light pink. "One day while playing in the snowI took a little fall you knowIt was awkward, don't you think ?I blushed so hard it turned me pink!"

questions.text: Which of these Beanie Babies lives on a mountain?
questions.explanation:
Goatee.

	Goatee is a mountain goat who is a gray and brown colored with dark gray horns.  Goatee's tail is very hairy. "Though she's hungry, she's in a good moodSearching through garbage, tin cans for foodFor Goatee the goat, it's not a big deal Anything at all makes a fine meal!"

questions.text: Which of these is a Bob Evans exclusive?
questions.explanation:
Gravy.

	Gravy is a dog that is best friends with Biscuit.  Together, they make Biscuits and Gravy.  Biscuits and gravy is a popular breakfast dish.  Gravy has a dark blue collar and has his tongue sticking out. "With my friend, Biscuit, by my sideWhen hungry, we always decideGo to the place with country charmWhere cooking's like down on the farm!"
